//Generated by BehavEd

set ( "SET_STANCE", "Sit" );
wait ( 10000.000 );
set ( "SET_STANCE", "Stand" );
sound ( /*@CHANNELS*/ CHAN_AUTO, "sound/misc/events/flush.wav" );
wait ( 5000.000 );
use ( "womensdoor" );

task ( "getout" )
{
	set ( "SET_TASK", "Path" );
	set ( /*@SET_TYPES*/ "SET_NAVGOAL", "donepotty" );
}

dowait ( "getout" );
set ( "SET_VIEW_SCRIPT", "NULL" );

task ( "leave" )
{
	set ( "SET_TASK", "Path" );
	set ( /*@SET_TYPES*/ "SET_NAVGOAL", "insideshop" );
}

dowait ( "leave" );
